title: Adversary
description: An ancient guard formed to protect the offspring of African and Italian royalty emerge. The Protezioni Segreti, have come from the heart of the Motherland to punish one of their own who has violated a sacred oath. But, there are far more dangerous adversaries lurking to strike at the heart of the Giacanti clan many believe are the founding family of organized crime. Africa's homeland is where Don's find their warrior heart as they are forced to kiss ancient soil.THE ALFONZO SERIESâ™ ALFONZO: VOLUME IASCENSION: ALFONZO VOLUME IIANARCHY: ALFONZO VOLUME IIIATONEMENT: ALFONZO VOLUME IVAWAKENING: ALFONZO VOLUME VANNIHILATION: ALFONZO VOLUME VIAFTERMATH: ALFONZO VOLUME VIIAFFIRMATION: ALFONZO VOLUME VIIIASSOCIATES: ALFONZO VOLUME IXANIMUS: ALFONZO VOLUME X ADVERSARY: ALFONZO VOLUME XI
author: S.W. Frank
